description: Sowgato Kumar Bhowmik (সৌগত কুমার ভৌমিক) is an internationally recognized Bangladeshi international research scientist. তিনি একজন আন্তর্জাতিকভাবে স্বীকৃত গবেষক ও বিজ্ঞানী। With over 20 years of in-depth study in Cybersecurity, Artificial Intelligence, Space Science, Medical Science, International Politics, and History, he is also a skilled freelancer specializing in Digital Marketing, SEO, Web Design, Programming, and Content Creation—areas he shares insights on through this blog. He is the founder of the Cyber Education and Online Freelancing Center, based in Tarash, Sirajganj, Bangladesh.
